   Plot: In sixteenth century Padua, Hortensio loves Bianca, the youngest daughter of Baptista. But Baptista will not allow the two to get married until his eldest daughter, the extremely headstrong Katherine, is betrothed. Title: The Taming of the Shrew (1593))
   Plot: In sixteenth century Padua, Hortensio loves Bianca, the youngest daughter of Baptista. But Baptista will not allow the two to get married until his eldest daughter, the extremely headstrong Katherine, is betrothed. Title: Downfall (N/ A))
   Plot: Raymond Massey narrates this short documentary film produced by the U. S. Treasury Department. Depicted is the battle of Iwo Jima in World War II, with the famous flag-raising atop Mount Suribachi by U. S. Marines and sailors. From the acclaimed photograph of the raising taken by Joe Rosenthal, sculptor Felix W. de Weldon creates a three- dimensional sculpture model, which then serves as the prototype for a larger statue which is installed at Quantico, Virginia, Marine Barracks.

conversation.text: I would recommend "Law Abiding Citizen" (2009) based on the user's preferences. The movie features Gregory Itzin as Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam. The movie is a shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.
